org.apache.juneau.rest.swagger

Class BasicSwaggerProviderSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.rest.swagger.BasicSwaggerProviderSession

  • public class BasicSwaggerProviderSession
extends Object
    A single session of generating a Swagger document.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BasicSwaggerProviderSession

        public BasicSwaggerProviderSession(RestContext context,
                                   Locale locale,
                                   FileFinder ff,
                                   Messages messages,
                                   VarResolverSession vr,
                                   JsonSchemaGeneratorSession js)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the REST object we're generating Swagger about.
        locale - The language of the swagger we're asking for.
        ff - The file finder to use for finding JSON files.
        messages - The messages to use for finding localized strings.
        vr - The variable resolver to use for resolving variables in the swagger.
        js - The JSON-schema generator to use for stuff like examples.

    • Method Detail

      • getSwagger

        public Swagger getSwagger()
                   throws Exception
        Generates the swagger.
        Returns:
        A new Swagger object.
        Throws:
        Exception - If an error occurred producing the Swagger.
